page.title: 06People of Wye
page.content: The old man was smoking a pipe he had a hat,a walking stick and a coat. He had lived in Wye for 63 years and he had worked at Wye College for 53 years. He had been in a prisoner-of-war camp in Japan and he had worked on the Death Line. There had been many changes since he was young. Where he lived there used to be fields. The old road sweeper was wearing over- alls. He fills about fifteen blue bags of gravel which is used for drives. He lives in Ashford but would like to live in Wye because it is peaceful. He enjoys his job he as been working for 2 and half years. He likes his job because people talk to him.
